```{r}
library(basemaps)
library(mapedit)

# view all available maps
get_maptypes()



ext <- draw_ext()
# or use draw_ext() to interactively draw an extent yourself



# set defaults for the basemap
set_defaults(ext = ext, map_service = "osm_stamen", map_type = "toner")


# load and return basemap map as class of choice, e.g. as image using magick:
basemap_plot(ext)

map <- basemap(ext)

# or as ggplot2:
map <- basemap_ggplot(ext)
ext <- st_transform(ext,  crs = st_crs(3857))
ext <- st_transform(ext,  crs = st_crs(3857))

# or as ggplot2 layer:

ggplot() + 
  basemap_gglayer(ext) + 
  geom_sf(data = ext, color = "red", fill = "transparent") +
  coord_sf() +
  scale_fill_identity()

library(ggplot2)
ggplot() + 
  basemap_gglayer(map) +
  geom_sf(data=districts_4326)

```
